alert.note: Alert for Bertie (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bertie County through 430 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lewiston Woodville, or near Aulander, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Bertie County, including the following locations... Askewville, Republican, Quitsna, Burden, Buena Vista and Connaritsa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
